info.title: Hyperledger Besu JSON-RPC Specification
info.description: A specification of the standard interface for Hyperledger Besu clients.

methods.name: web3_clientVersion
methods.description: Returns the version of the current client
methods.summary: current client version

result.name: clientVersion
result.description: client version

methods.name: web3_sha3
methods.summary: Hashes data
methods.description: Hashes data using the Keccak-256 algorithm

params.name: data
params.description: data to hash using the Keccak-256 algorithm

result.name: hashedData
result.description: Keccak-256 hash of the given data

methods.name: admin_addPeer
methods.summary: Adds a static node.

params.name: enodeURL
params.description: enode URL of peer to add.

result.name: addPeerResult
result.description: true if peer added or false if peer already a static node

methods.name: admin_changeLogLevel
methods.summary:
Changes the log level without restarting Besu. You can change the log level for all logs, or you can change the log level for specific packages or classes.
You can specify only one log level per RPC call.

params.name: level
params.description: log level

params.name: log_filter
params.description: (optional) packages or classes for which to change the log level

result.name: changeLogLevelResult
result.description: Success if the log level has changed, otherwise error

methods.name: admin_nodeInfo
methods.summary: Returns networking information about the node. The information includes general information about the node and specific information from each running Ethereum sub-protocol (for example, eth).

result.name: nodeInfoResult
result.description: node object

methods.name: admin_peers
methods.summary: Returns networking information about connected remote nodes.

result.name: peersResult
result.description: list of objects returned for each remote node, with the following fields.

methods.name: admin_generateLogBloomCache
methods.summary: Generates cached log bloom indexes for blocks. APIs such as eth_getLogs and eth_getFilterLogs use the cache for improved performance.

methods.name: admin_logsRemoveCache
methods.summary: Removes cache files for the specified range of blocks.

result.name: logsRemoveCacheResult
result.description: Cache Removed status or error

methods.name: admin_logsRepairCache
methods.summary: Removes cache files for the specified range of blocks.

result.name: logsRepairCacheResult
result.description: status of the repair request; Started or Already running

methods.name: admin_removePeer
methods.summary: Removes a static node.

params.name: enodeURL
params.description: enode URL of peer to remove.

result.name: removePeerResult
result.description: true if peer removed or false if peer not a static node

methods.name: debug_accountRange
methods.summary: Returns the accounts for a specified block

params.name: blockHashOrNumber
params.description: block hash or number

params.name: txIndex
params.description: transaction index from which to start

params.name: address
params.description: address hash from which to start

params.name: limit
params.description: maximum number of account entries to return

result.name: accountRangeResult
result.description: account details object with the following fields:

methods.name: debug_batchSendRawTransaction
methods.summary: Sends a list of signed transactions. This is used to quickly load a network with a lot of transactions. This does the same thing as calling eth_sendRawTransaction multiple times.

params.name: signedTransactionData
params.description: signed transaction data array

result.name: batchSendRawTransactionResult
result.description: object returned for each transaction.

methods.name: debug_getBadBlocks
methods.summary: Returns a list of invalid blocks. This is used to detect and analyze consensus flaws.

methods.name: debug_standardTraceBlockToFile
methods.summary: Generates files containing the block trace. A separate file is generated for each transaction in the block.

methods.name: debug_standardTraceBadBlockToFile
methods.summary: Generates files containing the block trace of invalid blocks. A separate file is generated for each transaction in the block.

result.name: standardTraceBadBlockToFileResult
result.description: location of the generated trace files

methods.name: debug_storageRangeAt
methods.summary: Returns the contract storage for the specified range.

params.name: blockHash
params.description: block hash or number

params.name: txIndex
params.description: transaction index from which to start

params.name: address
params.description: address hash from which to start

params.name: startKey
params.description: maximum number of account entries to return

params.name: limit
params.description: maximum number of account entries to return

result.name: storageRangeAtResult
result.description: the contract storage for the specified range.

methods.name: debug_metrics
methods.summary: Returns metrics providing information on the internal operation of Besu.

result.name: metricsResult
result.description: metrics object

methods.name: debug_traceTransaction
methods.summary: Reruns the transaction with the same state as when the transaction executed.

methods.name: debug_traceBlock
methods.summary: Returns full trace of all invoked opcodes of all transactions included in the block.

methods.name: debug_traceBlockByHash
methods.summary: Returns full trace of all invoked opcodes of all transactions included in the block.

methods.name: debug_traceBlockByNumber
methods.summary: Returns full trace of all invoked opcodes of all transactions included in the block.

methods.name: eth_accounts
methods.summary: Returns a list of addresses owned by client.

methods.name: eth_blockNumber
methods.summary: Returns the number of most recent block.

methods.name: eth_call
methods.summary: Executes a new message call (locally) immediately without creating a transaction on the block chain.

result.name: returnValue
result.description: The return value of the executed contract

methods.name: eth_chainId
methods.summary: Returns the currently configured chain id
methods.description: Returns the currently configured chain id, a value used in replay-protected transaction signing as introduced by [EIP-155](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-155.md).

result.name: chainId
result.description: hex format integer of the current chain id. Defaults are ETC=61, ETH=1, Morden=62.

methods.name: eth_coinbase
methods.summary: Returns the client coinbase address.

result.name: address
result.description: The address owned by the client that is used as default for things like the mining reward

methods.name: eth_estimateGas
methods.summary: Generates and returns an estimate of how much gas is necessary to allow the transaction to complete. The transaction will not be added to the blockchain. Note that the estimate may be significantly more than the amount of gas actually used by the transaction, for a variety of reasons including EVM mechanics and node performance.

result.name: gasUsed
result.description: The amount of gas used

methods.name: eth_gasPrice
methods.summary: Returns the current price per gas in wei

methods.name: eth_getBalance
methods.summary: Returns Ether balance of a given or account or contract

params.name: address
params.description: The address of the account or contract

params.name: blockNumber
params.description: A BlockNumber at which to request the balance

methods.name: eth_getBlockByHash
methods.summary: Gets a block for a given hash

params.name: includeTransactions
params.description: If `true` it returns the full transaction objects, if `false` only the hashes of the transactions.

methods.name: eth_getBlockByNumber
methods.summary: Gets a block for a given number

params.name: includeTransactions
params.description: If `true` it returns the full transaction objects, if `false` only the hashes of the transactions.

methods.name: eth_getBlockTransactionCountByHash
methods.summary: Returns the number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block hash.

result.name: blockTransactionCountByHash
result.description: The Number of total transactions in the given block

methods.name: eth_getBlockTransactionCountByNumber
methods.summary: Returns the number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block number.

result.name: blockTransactionCountByHash
result.description: The Number of total transactions in the given block

methods.name: eth_getCode
methods.summary: Returns code at a given contract address

params.name: address
params.description: The address of the contract

params.name: blockNumber
params.description: A BlockNumber of which the code existed

methods.name: eth_getLogs
methods.summary: Returns an array of all logs matching a given filter object.

methods.name: eth_getStorageAt
methods.summary: Gets a storage value from a contract address, a position, and an optional blockNumber

methods.name: eth_getTransactionByBlockHashAndIndex
methods.summary: Returns the information about a transaction requested by the block hash and index of which it was mined.

params.name: index
params.description: The ordering in which a transaction is mined within its block.

methods.name: eth_getTransactionByBlockNumberAndIndex
methods.summary: Returns the information about a transaction requested by the block number and index of which it was mined.

params.name: index
params.description: The ordering in which a transaction is mined within its block.

methods.name: eth_getTransactionByHash
methods.summary: Returns the information about a transaction requested by transaction hash.

methods.name: eth_getTransactionCount
methods.summary: Returns the number of transactions sent from an address

methods.name: eth_getTransactionReceipt
methods.summary: Returns the receipt information of a transaction by its hash.

result.name: transactionReceiptResult
result.description: returns either a receipt or null

methods.name: eth_getUncleByBlockHashAndIndex
methods.summary: Returns information about a uncle of a block by hash and uncle index position.

params.name: index
params.description: The ordering in which a uncle is included within its block.

methods.name: eth_getUncleByBlockNumberAndIndex
methods.summary: Returns information about a uncle of a block by hash and uncle index position.

params.name: uncleBlockNumber
params.description: The block in which the uncle was included

params.name: index
params.description: The ordering in which a uncle is included within its block.

result.name: uncleResult
result.description: returns an uncle block or null

methods.name: eth_getUncleCountByBlockHash
methods.summary: Returns the number of uncles in a block from a block matching the given block hash.

result.name: uncleCountResult
result.description: The Number of total uncles in the given block

methods.name: eth_getUncleCountByBlockNumber
methods.summary: Returns the number of uncles in a block from a block matching the given block number.

methods.name: eth_getProof
methods.summary: Returns the account- and storage-values of the specified account including the Merkle-proof.

params.name: address
params.description: The address of the account or contract

schema.title: storageKeys
schema.description: A storage key is indexed from the solidity compiler by the order it is declared. For mappings it uses the keccak of the mapping key with its position (and recursively for X-dimensional mappings)

oneOf.title: proofAccount
oneOf.description: The merkle proofs of the specified account connecting them to the blockhash of the block specified

address.title: proofAccountAddress
address.description: The address of the account or contract of the request

balance.title: proofAccountBalance
balance.description: The Ether balance of the account or contract of the request

codeHash.title: proofAccountCodeHash
codeHash.description: The code hash of the contract of the request (keccak(NULL) if external account)

nonce.title: proofAccountNonce
nonce.description: The transaction count of the account or contract of the request

storageHash.title: proofAccountStorageHash
storageHash.description: The storage hash of the contract of the request (keccak(rlp(NULL)) if external account)

methods.name: eth_getWork
methods.summary: Returns the hash of the current block, the seedHash, and the boundary condition to be met ('target').

methods.name: eth_hashrate
methods.summary: Returns the number of hashes per second that the node is mining with.

result.name: hashesPerSecond
result.description: Integer of the number of hashes per second

methods.name: eth_mining
methods.summary: Returns true if client is actively mining new blocks.

result.name: mining
result.description: Whether or not the client is mining

methods.name: eth_newBlockFilter
methods.summary: Creates a filter in the node, to notify when a new block arrives. To check if the state has changed, call eth_getFilterChanges.

methods.name: eth_newFilter
methods.summary: Creates a filter object, based on filter options, to notify when the state changes (logs). To check if the state has changed, call eth_getFilterChanges.

result.name: filterId
result.description: The filter ID for use in `eth_getFilterChanges`

methods.name: eth_getFilterChanges
methods.summary: Polling method for a filter, which returns an array of logs which occurred since last poll.

methods.name: eth_getFilterLogs
methods.summary: Returns an array of all logs matching filter with given id.

methods.name: eth_uninstallFilter
methods.summary: Uninstalls a filter with given id. Should always be called when watch is no longer needed. Additionally Filters timeout when they aren't requested with eth_getFilterChanges for a period of time.

result.name: filterUninstalledSuccess
result.description: returns true if the filter was successfully uninstalled, false otherwise.

methods.name: eth_newPendingTransactionFilter
methods.summary: Creates a filter in the node, to notify when new pending transactions arrive. To check if the state has changed, call eth_getFilterChanges.

methods.name: eth_sendRawTransaction
methods.summary: Creates new message call transaction or a contract creation for signed transactions.

params.name: signedTransactionData
params.description: The signed transaction data

result.name: transactionHash
result.description: The transaction hash, or the zero hash if the transaction is not yet available.

methods.name: eth_submitHashrate
methods.summary: Used for submitting mining hashrate.

params.name: id
params.description: String identifying the client

result.name: submitHashRateSuccess
result.description: whether of not submitting went through successfully

methods.name: eth_submitWork
methods.summary: Used for submitting a proof-of-work solution.

result.name: solutionValid
result.description: returns true if the provided solution is valid, otherwise false.

params.name: nonceExample
params.description: example of a number only used once

params.name: powHashExample
params.description: proof of work to submit

params.name: mixHashExample
params.description: the mix digest example

result.name: solutionInvalidExample
result.description: this example should return `false` as it is not a valid pow to submit

methods.name: eth_syncing
methods.summary: Returns an object with data about the sync status or false.

oneOf.title: syncingData
oneOf.description: An object with sync status data

startingBlock.title: syncingDataStartingBlock
startingBlock.description: Block at which the import started (will only be reset, after the sync reached his head)

currentBlock.title: syncingDataCurrentBlock
currentBlock.description: The current block, same as eth_blockNumber

methods.name: eth_subscribe
methods.summary: If successful this returns the subscription id. Subscriptions are creates with a regular RPC call with eth_subscribe as method and the subscription name as first parameter.

methods.name: eth_unsubscribe
methods.summary: Subscriptions are cancelled with a regular RPC call with eth_unsubscribe as method and the subscription id as first parameter.

methods.name: ibft_discardValidatorVote
methods.summary: Discards a proposal to add or remove a validator with the specified address.

params.name: address
params.description: Address of proposed validator.

result.name: discardValidatorVoteResult
result.description: Indicates if the proposal is discarded

methods.name: ibft_getPendingVotes
methods.summary: Returns votes cast in the current epoch.

result.name: getPendingVotesResult
result.description: Map of strings to booleans - map of account addresses to corresponding boolean values indicating the vote for each account; if true, the vote is to add a validator. If false, the proposal is to remove a validator.

methods.name: ibft_getSignerMetrics
methods.summary: Provides the following validator metrics for the specified range:
methods.description:
Number of blocks from each validator
Block number of the last block proposed by each validator (if any proposed in the specified range)
All validators present in the last block of the range

result.name: getSignerMetricsResult
result.description: list of validator objects

methods.name: ibft_getValidatorsByBlockHash
methods.summary: Lists the validators defined in the specified block.

result.name: getValidatorsByBlockHashResult
result.description: List of validator addresses.

methods.name: ibft_getValidatorsByBlockNumber
methods.summary: Lists the validators defined in the specified block.

result.name: getValidatorsByBlockNumberResult
result.description: List of validator addresses.

methods.name: ibft_proposeValidatorVote
methods.summary: Proposes to add or remove a validator with the specified address.

methods.name: net_enode
methods.summary: Returns the enode URL.

result.name: enodeResult
result.description: Enode URL of the node.

methods.name: net_listening
methods.summary: Whether the client is actively listening for network connections.

result.name: listeningResult
result.description: Indicates if the client is actively listening for network connections

methods.name: net_peerCount
methods.summary: Returns the number of peers currently connected to the client.

result.name: peerCountResult
result.description: Mumber of connected peers in hexadecimal

methods.name: net_services
methods.summary: Returns enabled services (for example, jsonrpc) and the host and port for each service.

methods.name: net_version
methods.summary: Returns the network ID.

result.name: versionResult
result.description: hex format integer of the current chain id.

methods.name: trace_block
methods.summary: Provides transaction processing of type trace for the specified block.

params.name: blockNumber
params.summary: integer representing a block number or one of the string tags latest, earliest, or pending.

result.name: blockResult
result.description: list of calls to other contracts containing one object per call, in transaction execution order

methods.name: trace_replayBlockTransactions
methods.summary: Provides transaction processing tracing per block.

params.name: blockNumber
params.summary: integer representing a block number or one of the string tags latest, earliest, or pending.

schema.description: The set of node values needed to traverse a patricia merkle tree (from root to leaf) to retrieve a value

result.name: replayBlockTransactionsResult
result.description: the trace list items in the returned transaction trace object include the revert reason.

methods.name: priv_call
methods.summary: Invokes a private contract function locally and does not change the privacy group state.

result.name: callResult
result.description: return value of the executed contract

methods.name: priv_createPrivacyGroup
methods.summary: Creates a group of nodes.

schema.description: request options object with the following fields

methods.name: priv_deletePrivacyGroup
methods.summary: Returns the state root of the specified privacy group at the specified block.

methods.name: priv_distributeRawTransaction
methods.summary: Distributes a signed, RLP encoded private transaction.

result.name: distributeRawTransactionResult
result.description: the enclave key is a pointer to the private transaction in Orion.

methods.name: priv_findPrivacyGroup
methods.summary: Returns a list of privacy groups containing only the listed members

result.name: findPrivacyGroupResult
result.summary: privacyGroupObjects containing only the specified members;
result.description:
privacy group objects containing only the specified members; privacy groups are EEA-compliant or Besu-extended with types:
LEGACY for EEA-compliant groups.
PANTHEON for Besu-extended groups.

methods.name: priv_getCode
methods.summary: Returns the code of the private smart contract at the specified address. Compiled smart contract code is stored as a hexadecimal value.

result.name: getCodeResult
result.description: Code stored at the specified address

methods.name: priv_getEeaTransactionCount
methods.summary: Returns the private transaction count for the specified account and group of sender and recipients.

result.name: getEeaTransactionCountResult
result.description: integer representing the number of private transactions sent from the address to the specified group of sender and recipients

methods.name: priv_getFilterChanges
methods.summary: Returns an array of logs for the specified filter for a private contract.

result.name: getFilterChangesResult
result.description: list of log objects, or an empty list if nothing has changed since the last poll

methods.name: priv_getFilterLogs
methods.summary: Polls the specified filter for a private contract and returns an array of changes that have occurred since the last poll.

result.name: getFilterLogsResult
result.description: list of log objects, or an empty list if nothing has changed since the last poll

methods.name: priv_getLogs
methods.summary: Returns an array of logs matching a specified filter object.

result.name: getLogsResult
result.description: list of log objects, or an empty list if nothing has changed since the last poll

methods.name: priv_getPrivacyPrecompileAddress
methods.summary: Returns the address of the privacy precompiled contract. The address is derived and based on the value of the privacy-flexible-groups-enabled option.

methods.name: priv_getPrivateTransaction
methods.summary: Returns the private transaction if you are a participant, otherwise, null.

methods.name: priv_getTransactionCount
methods.summary: Returns the private transaction count for specified account and privacy group.

methods.name: priv_getTransactionReceipt
methods.summary: Returns information about the private transaction after mining the transaction. Receipts for pending transactions are not available.

methods.name: priv_newFilter
methods.summary: Creates a log filter for a private contract. To poll for logs associated with the created filter, use priv_getFilterChanges. To get all logs associated with the filter, use priv_getFilterLogs.

methods.name: priv_uninstallFilter
methods.summary: Uninstalls a filter for a private contract with the specified ID. When a filter is no longer required, call this method.

methods.name: priv_debugGetStateRoot
methods.summary: Returns the state root of the specified privacy group at the specified block.

methods.name: txpool_besuPendingTransactions
methods.summary: Lists pending transactions that match the supplied filter conditions.

methods.name: txpool_besuStatistics
methods.summary: Lists statistics about the node transaction pool.

methods.name: txpool_besuTransactions
methods.summary: Lists transactions in the node transaction pool.

timestamp.title: blockTimeStamp
timestamp.description: The unix timestamp for when the block was collated

ProofNode.title: proofNode
ProofNode.description: An individual node used to prove a path down a merkle-patricia-tree

StorageProofKey.title: storageProofKey
StorageProofKey.description: The key used to get the storage slot in its account tree.

items.title: storageProof
items.description: Object proving a relationship of a storage value to an account's storageHash.

value.title: storageProofValue
value.description: The value of the storage slot in its account tree

ProofNodes.title: proofNodes
ProofNodes.description: The set of node values needed to traverse a patricia merkle tree (from root to leaf) to retrieve a value

SeedHash.title: seedHash
SeedHash.description: The seed hash used for the DAG.

FilterId.title: filterId
FilterId.description: An identifier used to reference the filter.

BlockHash.title: blockHash
BlockHash.description: The hex representation of the Keccak 256 of the RLP encoded block

BlockNumber.title: blockNumber
BlockNumber.description: The hex representation of the block's height

contractAddress.title: ReceiptContractAddress
contractAddress.description: The contract address created, if the transaction was a contract creation, otherwise null

cumulativeGasUsed.title: ReceiptCumulativeGasUsed
cumulativeGasUsed.description: The gas units used by the transaction

gasUsed.title: ReceiptGasUsed
gasUsed.description: The total gas used by the transaction

logs.title: logs
logs.description: An array of all the logs triggered during the transaction

postTransactionState.title: ReceiptPostTransactionState
postTransactionState.description: The intermediate stateRoot directly after transaction execution.

status.title: ReceiptStatus
status.description: Whether or not the transaction threw an error.

BloomFilter.title: bloomFilter
BloomFilter.description: A 2048 bit bloom filter from the logs of the transaction. Each log sets 3 bits though taking the low-order 11 bits of each of the first three pairs of bytes in a Keccak 256 hash of the log's byte series

Log.title: log
Log.description: An indexed event generated during a transaction

data.title: LogData
data.description: The data/input string sent along with the transaction

logIndex.title: LogIndex
logIndex.description: The index of the event within its transaction, null when its pending

removed.title: logIsRemoved
removed.description: Whether or not the log was orphaned off the main chain

Logs.title: logs
Logs.description: An array of all the logs triggered during the transaction

Topics.title: LogTopics
Topics.description: Topics are order-dependent. Each topic can also be an array of DATA with 'or' options.

Topic.title: topic
Topic.description: 32 Bytes DATA of indexed log arguments. (In solidity: The first topic is the hash of the signature of the event (e.g. Deposit(address,bytes32,uint256))

TransactionIndex.title: transactionIndex
TransactionIndex.description: The index of the transaction. null when its pending

BlockNumberOrNull.title: blockNumberOrNull
BlockNumberOrNull.description: The block number or null when its the pending block

BlockHashOrNull.title: blockHashOrNull
BlockHashOrNull.description: The block hash or null when its the pending block

NonceOrNull.title: nonceOrNull
NonceOrNull.description: Randomly selected number to satisfy the proof-of-work or null when its the pending block

To.title: To
To.description: Destination address of the transaction. Null if it was a contract create.

Block.title: Block
Block.description: The Block is the collection of relevant pieces of information (known as the block header), together with information corresponding to the comprised transactions, and a set of other block headers that are known to have a parent equal to the present block’s parent’s parent.

sha3Uncles.title: blockShaUncles
sha3Uncles.description: Keccak hash of the uncles data in the block

logsBloom.title: blockLogsBloom
logsBloom.description: The bloom filter for the logs of the block or null when its the pending block

transactionsRoot.title: blockTransactionsRoot
transactionsRoot.description: The root of the transactions trie of the block.

stateRoot.title: blockStateRoot
stateRoot.description: The root of the final state trie of the block

receiptsRoot.title: blockReceiptsRoot
receiptsRoot.description: The root of the receipts trie of the block

difficulty.title: blockDifficulty
difficulty.description: Integer of the difficulty for this block

totalDifficulty.title: blockTotalDifficulty
totalDifficulty.description: Integer of the total difficulty of the chain until this block

extraData.title: blockExtraData
extraData.description: The 'extra data' field of this block

size.title: blockSize
size.description: Integer the size of this block in bytes

gasLimit.title: blockGasLimit
gasLimit.description: The maximum gas allowed in this block

gasUsed.title: blockGasUsed
gasUsed.description: The total used gas by all transactions in this block

timestamp.title: blockTimeStamp
timestamp.description: The unix timestamp for when the block was collated

transactions.title: transactionsOrHashes
transactions.description: Array of transaction objects, or 32 Bytes transaction hashes depending on the last given parameter

items.title: uncleHash
items.description: Block hash of the RLP encoding of an uncle block

gas.title: transactionGas
gas.description: The gas limit provided by the sender in Wei

gasPrice.title: transactionGasPrice
gasPrice.description: The gas price willing to be paid by the sender in Wei

input.title: transactionInput
input.description: The data field sent with the transaction

nonce.title: transactionNonce
nonce.description: The total number of prior transactions made by the sender

value.title: transactionValue
value.description: Value of Ether being transferred in Wei

gas.title: transactionGas
gas.description: The gas limit provided by the sender in Wei

gasPrice.title: transactionGasPrice
gasPrice.description: The gas price willing to be paid by the sender in Wei

input.title: transactionInput
input.description: The data field sent with the transaction

nonce.title: transactionNonce
nonce.description: The total number of prior transactions made by the sender

TransactionHash.title: transactionHash
TransactionHash.description: Keccak 256 Hash of the RLP encoding of a transaction

Keccak.title: keccak
Keccak.description: Hex representation of a Keccak 256 hash

Nonce.title: nonce
Nonce.description: A number only to be used once

Addresses.title: addresses
Addresses.description: List of contract addresses from which to monitor events

Position.title: position
Position.description: Hex representation of the storage slot where the variable exists

DataWord.title: dataWord
DataWord.description: Hex representation of a 256 bit unit of data

Bytes.title: bytes
Bytes.description: Hex representation of a variable length byte array

schema.title: signatureBytes
schema.description: Hex representation of byte array between 2 and 65 chars long

schema.title: gasPriceResult
schema.description: Integer of the current gas price

UncleCountResult.name: uncleCountResult
UncleCountResult.description: The Number of total uncles in the given block

schema.title: filter
schema.description: A filter used to monitor the blockchain for log/events

Logs.name: logs
Logs.description: An array of all logs matching filter with given id.
